attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petition the Prime Minister to ban the drinking of all alcoholic drinks in the streets in an effort to stop drunken yobs gathering and causing distress and abuse to decent people  and damage to property

rejection.details: There is no title, and there are already similar petitions.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
